alert.note: Alert for Holt (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:20PM CDT until July 16 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HOLT COUNTY... At 219 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles southeast of O`Neill, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ewing, Page, Inman and Knievels Corner. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 313 and 328. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
